lead_paragraph: It took Ángel Franco a few days to make a picture that represented the extent of a tragedy that occurred on Staten Island in late July.
snippet: A three-alarm blaze in Staten Island grew into an even more tragic story.

headline.main: Fire and Death on Staten Island

byline.original: By KERRI MACDONALD and ANGEL FRANCO

abstract: A three-alarm blaze in Staten Island grew into an even more tragic story.
